slide1.title: Structural Advantage of a Small Fund
slide1.description: The fund’s size enables faster execution, targeted deal access, and active oversight — benefits not typically available to larger institutional vehicles.

slide2.title: Regulated and Globally Positioned
slide2.description: Vertex FinCapital operates under the Singapore VCC framework and is managed by MAS-licensed XEQ Capital, providing legal clarity, investor protection, and international credibility.

slide3.title: Aligned Profit Distribution Model
slide3.description: Investors receive the first 12% p.a. of returns. Only after this threshold is met does the fund share in profits, ensuring investor-first economics at the structural level

slide4.title:
Fee Discipline
and Alignment
slide4.description: The fund applies a flat 2% management fee (covering all operating expenses) and performance fees only apply above a 12% return, ensuring investor-aligned incentives.

slide5.title:
Selective
Participation
slide5.description: The investor base is intentionally capped at 20–30 parties to preserve deal quality and access discipline.

homeHero.title:
Leverage Unique Opportunities.
Create Value. Deliver Results.
homeHero.description:
Regulated in Singapore. Open-ended structure.
Multi-asset strategy.

homeLast.title: Investor Access & Inquiry
homeLast.description: Vertex FinCapital works exclusively with accredited investors. To request documentation or discuss participation, please submit the form below. All submissions are reviewed individually by the fund’s management team.

slide1.text1: The fund offers accredited investors access to private market opportunities across real estate, private equity, credit, venture capital, and public equities.
slide1.text2: Combining institutional governance with boutique agility, the fund serves as a core alternative allocation for sophisticated portfolios.
slide1.title: Vertex FinCapital is a MAS-regulated investment fund structured under Singapore’s XEQ Global Alternatives VCC.

slide2.text1: Real estate (equity or structured debt in development-stage projects)
slide2.text2: Private equity (payments, proptech, scalable B2B platforms)
slide2.text3: Secured private credit (with collateral and oversight)
slide2.text4: Public small-cap equities (value-oriented with near-term catalysts)
slide2.title:
Our key
investment focus

item1.title:
Capital Deployment
Strategy
item1.description: Vertex FinCapital applies a structured approach to private market investments, allocating funds across real estate, private equity, credit, and venture opportunities. Each investment is selected based on rigorous evaluation, focusing on value creation and long-term returns.

item2.title:
Interim Fund
Management
item2.description: Pending private market transactions, unallocated capital is strategically placed in listed securities. This ensures liquidity maintenance while minimizing cash drag, allowing productive deployment even during transitional phases.

item3.title:
Investment
Oversight
item3.description: A senior investment manager directly oversees interim portfolio positions through a dedicated brokerage account. The focus remains on selecting high-quality equities and bonds, ensuring consistent performance and risk-adjusted returns.

exploreFund.title1:
Learn how Vertex FinCapital operates
within a regulated framework:
exploreFund.title: Explore the Fund Further

item1.title: Singapore & Southeast Asia
item1.description: Tech growth, real estate corridors, early-stage fintech

investmentStrategyHero.title: Investment Strategy
investmentStrategyHero.description: Targeted Allocation. Disciplined Structure. Active Oversight.

item1.title: Structured Security
item1.description: Secured lending and senior debt structures minimize downside risk and enhance capital protection.

item2.title: Private Equity
item2.description: Expansion-stage follow-on investments. Focus on payments, asset-light real estate platforms, and scalable B2B models.

item3.title: Private Credit
item3.description: Secured lending to mid-market firms. Yields of 8–20% p.a., collateralized by property, receivables, or guarantees. Includes board rights, covenants, oversight.

item4.title: Venture Capital
item4.description: Direct or syndicated exposure to early-stage fintech, proptech, and data infra startups. Targets asymmetric upside.

strategicFlexibility.title: Strategic Flexibility
strategicFlexibility.item1: When private deal flow is pending, available funds are temporarily allocated to
strategicFlexibility.item3: This ensures productivity and prevents idle capital while maintaining a balanced portfolio.

strategyInclude.title: Include
strategyInclude.item2: Capital may be temporarily allocated to listed securities while private deals are in process
strategyInclude.item3: Managed through a dedicated brokerage account by a senior investment manager
strategyInclude.item4: Focus on value-based equity and bond positions to avoid cash drag

item1.title:
Real
Estate
item1.text: Investments in pre-completion residential, commercial, or mixed-use projects. Focus on permits, strong sponsors, and clear exit strategies.

item2.title:
Private
Equity
item2.text: Expansion-stage investments in scalable businesses—payments, proptech, and asset-light real estate platforms.

item3.title:
Private
Credit
item3.text: Secured lending to mid-market firms. Yield range 8–20% p.a., backed by property, receivables, or guarantees. Includes board rights and oversight.

item4.title:
Venture
Capital
item4.text: Early-stage exposure in fintech, proptech, and data infrastructure startups. Selective investments with high-growth potential.

item5.title:
Small-Cap
Equities
item5.text: Opportunistic positions in listed or pre-IPO firms showing undervaluation and near-term catalysts.

targetPortfolio.title: Portfolio Allocation & Asset Classes
targetPortfolio.note2: Adjustments occur quarterly or as needed, ensuring no single asset class exceeds 50% of NAV.

investorHero.title: Investor Information
investorHero.description: Eligibility Criteria. Subscription Process. Transparent Reporting.

servicePartners.title: Service Partners
servicePartners.description: Vertex FinCapital works with a select group of established service providers, each fulfilling a critical role in the fund’s legal, operational, and regulatory infrastructure. From administration and custody to audit, compliance, and tax advisory, these partners ensure that every aspect of the fund operates with institutional precision and transparency.

serviceProvidersHero.title: Service Providers
serviceProvidersHero.description: Specialist Institutions. Independent Oversight. Institutional-Grade Operations.

fundHero.title: Vertex FinCapital
fundHero.description: Singapore-domiciled. Institutionally managed. Focused on results.

fundPositioning.title: Fund Positioning & Objectives
fundPositioning.description: Vertex FinCapital serves as a core alternative allocation for accredited investors, combining boutique agility with institutional standards. The fund is limited to 20–30 participants and follows a high-conviction, access-driven strategy focused on private market opportunities.

item1.title:
Fund
Structure
item1.description: Vertex is a Singapore-domiciled, open-ended fund, which is managed by Vertex FinCapital Pte. Ltd. (“Vertex”), a Singapore-registered fund manager.

item2.title:
Regulatory
Status
item2.description: The fund is licensed and regulated by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS).

item3.title:
Management &
Framework
item3.description: Managed by XEQ Capital, promoted by YB Advisors. VCC structure provides asset protection, tax efficiency, and governance.

keyFeatures.title1: Performance fees apply only after a 12% return
keyFeatures.title2: Direct contact — no portals or intermediaries.
keyFeatures.title3: Fast execution with active deal oversight.
keyFeatures.title: Key Features / Differentiators

teamRepresentatives.text1_1: Represents XEQ Capital. Specializes in multi-asset portfolio design and macroeconomic research.
teamRepresentatives.text1_2: Formerly held senior roles at AIA, Phillip Capital, and Prudential. Brings disciplined execution and conservative capital allocation expertise.
teamRepresentatives.text2_1: Represents YB Advisors. CPA (Israel) with 15+ years in cross-border fund structuring, tax strategy, and investor relations.
teamRepresentatives.text2_2: Active across Europe and Israel, with strong integration of digital finance systems.
teamRepresentatives.title: Team Representatives

footer.companyInfo: A Regulated Fund Investing in High-Impact Opportunities.
